name: recruit-ai-poc
description: Recruit-AI proof of concept for resume screening and interview recommendation

scripts.check: node -e "const {scoreCandidate}=require('./lib/scoring'); const out=scoreCandidate({jobDescription:'Need React TypeScript AWS communication', resumeText:'React TypeScript AWS communication'}); if(typeof out.overall_score!=='number'){process.exit(1)}; console.log('check-ok');"
